#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T, i, max, n;

	scanf("%d", &T);

	while (T--)
	{

		scanf("%d", &n);

		max = 0;

		int point[n][2];

		for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
			cin >> point[j][0] >> point[j][1];

		for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
		{
			float slope[n - j - 1];

			int count = 0;

			for (int k = j + 1; k < n; k++)
				slope[count++] =
					((float)(point[k][1] - point[j][1])) /
					((float)(point[k][0] - point[j][0]));

			sort(slope, slope + count);

			int temp_max = 1;

			for (int k = 0; k < count; k++)
			{
				if (slope[k] == slope[k + 1])
				{
					temp_max++;
				}
				else
				{
					if (temp_max > max)

						max = temp_max;

					temp_max = 1;
				}
			}
		}

		printf("%d\n", max+1);
	}

	return 0;
}
